meanings.definition: A small, pointed instrument used for writing or drawing.
meanings.sent1: I used a stylus to draw a picture of my cat.
meanings.sent2: The artist carefully selected a stylus to sketch the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The stylus danced across the paper, creating a masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her words flowed from the stylus like a river of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The stylus felt like a magic wand, bringing art to life.

meanings.definition: A tool used for inputting commands on a touchscreen device.
meanings.sent1: The stylus helped me navigate the tablet with precision.
meanings.sent2: She tapped the screen with the stylus to open the app.
meanings.sent3: The stylus played a game of tag with the icons on the screen.
meanings.sent4: His ideas flowed through the stylus onto the digital canvas.
meanings.sent5: With the stylus in hand, she felt like a digital artist extraordinaire.

meanings.definition: A pointed instrument used in ancient times for writing on wax tablets.
meanings.sent1: The archaeologist discovered an ancient stylus in the ruins.
meanings.sent2: In history class, we learned about the stylus used by scribes.
meanings.sent3: The stylus whispered secrets of the past as it etched on the tablet.
meanings.sent4: The stylus was like a time-traveling pen, revealing ancient stories.
meanings.sent5: With the stylus, the past came alive on the wax tablet.
